name: PixelFem #78 - Angela Davis
description:
Angela Davis first gained international reputation during her imprisonment and trial on conspiracy charges in 1970–72. She would be acquitted of these charges and has since continued speaking about issues surrounding women, race and class. Today, Angela Davis is known internationally for her ongoing work to combat all forms of oppression in the U.S. and abroad. Over the years she has been active as a student, teacher, writer, scholar, and activist/organizer. She is a living witness to the historical struggles of the contemporary era.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
